sections.heading: Short title.   This Act may be cited as the Local Government Electronic Reverse Auction Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Local Government Electronic Reverse Auction Act.

sections.heading: Unit of local government defined
sections.text: As used in this Act, "unit" and "unit of local government" mean a unit of local government as defined in Section 1 of Article VII of the Illinois Constitution.
